Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to extending the effectiveness of certain provisions regarding hotel/motel taxes in Chautauqua county
Summary: Extends the effectiveness of certain provisions regarding hotel/motel taxes in Chautauqua county.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 405 of the laws of 2007, amending the tax law relating to increasing hotel/motel taxes in Chautauqua county, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
